text: mattu navu helidevu; ‘‘i nadannu (jerusalemannu) pravesisiri hagu nim'miccheyante, adara yavude bhagadinda dharala unniri hagu vinayapurvaka bagikondu adara dvaradolage pravesisiri mattu ‘hittah’ (nam'mannu ksamisu) endu heluttaliri – navu nim'ma papagalannu ksamisibiduvevu mattu navu satkarmigalige mattastu niduvevu’’
